text: Hertz is a global car rental and
Mobility company we've been in business
for more than 100 years we operate
globally in many countries and Hertz
gets people and things where they need
to be we are using AWS for a number of
different initiatives at the company at
the moment we're using it as the core
technology for our Hertz mobile app the
mobile app is going to increasingly be
the method by which they sort of shop
book rent return a car these days all
cars have connectivity to the cloud and
we take position mileage Fuel and a
number of other readings from Cars
several times a minute all of the auto
manufacturers use different data sets
and and there's no real consistency in
how all that connected car data comes
together so we've used the AWS platform
to bring all that data back together and
that helps us make sure that we get the
right car in the right place for our
customers but also we're starting to use
it for new Digital customer experiences
so when you return burn your car for
example the days of you having to you
know manually look at Fuel and mileage
and so forth that'll all be enabled
through our platform we've been a AWS
customer since 2018 and we really like
the product Innovation that AWS has
brought to us that's enabling us to
build these new experiences for our
customers our employees and our partners
